text: Burtsevo () is a rural locality (a village) in Russko-Yurmashsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 217 as of 2010. There are 18 streets. == Geography == It is located 25 km from Ufa, 9 km from Russky Yurmash. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Burtsevo
